  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3303</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Value of Debate in Today’s World</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Wert der Debatte in der Today?s Welt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La valeur de la discussion en monde de Today?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O valor do debate no mundo de Today?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il valore del dibattito in mondo di Today?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αξία της συζήτησης στον κόσμο Today?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El valor del discusión en el mundo de Today?s</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These are the proceedings from a workshop for teachers on the value of debating, different types of debate and an assessment of its use in the classroom.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning strategies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">debates</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese sind die Verfahren von einer Werkstatt für
Lehrer auf dem Wert des Debattierens, den unterschiedlichen Typen der 
Debatte und einer Einschätzung seines Gebrauches im Klassenzimmer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce sont les démarches d'un atelier pour des 
professeurs sur la valeur de la discussion, différents types de 
discussion et une évaluation de son utilisation dans la salle de 
classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas são as continuações de uma oficina para 
professores no valor de debater, em tipos diferentes de debate e em 
uma avaliação de seu uso na sala de aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi sono gli atti da un workshop per gli 
insegnanti sul valore di dibattere, sui tipi differenti di dibattiti e
su una valutazione del relativo uso nell'aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά είναι τα πρακτικά από ένα εργαστήριο για τους 
δασκάλους στην αξία των συζητώντας, διαφορετικών τύπων 
συζητήσεων και μια αξιολόγηση της χρήσης του στην τάξη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éstos son los procedimientos de un taller para 
los profesores en el valor de discutir, diversos tipos de discusión y
un gravamen de su uso en la sala de clase.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lernenstrategien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Debatten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">stratégies d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">discussions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estratégias de aprendizagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">debates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
